H0.text: name a food you might eat on thanksgiving. Mashed Potatoes

H1.text: name a food you might eat on thanksgiving. Pumpkin Pie

H2.text: name a food you might eat on thanksgiving. Green Bean Casserole

H3.text: name a food you might eat on thanksgiving. turkey

A4.text: pumpkin pie are among the side dishes commonly associated with Thanksgiving dinner.

A5.text: Turkey, usually roasted and stuffed (but sometimes deep-fried instead), is typically the featured item on most Thanksgiving feast tables.

A6.text: In the United States and Canada, it is usually prepared for Thanksgiving, Christmas, and other occasions when pumpkin is in season.

A7.text: Lydia Maria Child's Thanksgiving poem 'Over the River and Through the Wood' (1844) mentions pumpkin pie.
